articles.title: US may soon deport migrants to Libya - reports - BBC
articles.description: Migrants may be flown to the troubled North African nation as part of the US' immigration crackdown.
articles.content:
The US may soon start deporting migrants to Libya as part of its crackdown on immigration, two US officials have told BBC partner CBS News.
The officials, who requested anonymity, said the US milita… [+1463 chars]
